attributes.review: This app is so trash! Literally sold all my information to overseas countries! This app called me fat and pushed me down the stairs! I am currently in the hospital writing this and they said I did not have an identify because this app sold it so now I am stuck in this hospital. APPLE PLEASE DELETE THIS TRASH APP.

attributes.review: TERRIBLE app. I opened the app to be greeted by a DISGUSTING, white supremacist, racist, xenophobic, islamaphobic, homophobic, misogynistic, man promoting hate speech all over this app. Absolutely FILTHY and disgusting. I’m so disappointed this app even exists. I’m sick to my stomach after downloading this filth. Do better at monitoring apps, Apple. Anyways acab & blm 😻😿😼😎😏
